title: Hextech Crafting Miss Fortunes - Wish me luck
body:
My dream is to own Road Warrior Miss Fortune and with this current event I had a chance. I saved up my tokens and bought my 3 orbs of Order (yea that's right. I support the Order!) 

First orb. I crossed my fingers:
http://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/portrait/gragas-vandal.jpg

How you taunt me so, but its an element for crafting. The Vandal.

Second orb. My chances were low, but I still hoped:
http://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/portrait/vayne-vindicator.jpg

The sexy lady element. Perfect!

Third orb. This has to be it:
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-m0ZGCEbccGg/Vw1GBCTmVBI/AAAAAAAANZk/AlJrDrZQbBQwY2js2Gq1fJzCdpWPatREQCLcB/s1600/Renekton_1.jpg

Galactic Ren? I guess... uh... the warrior element? Yea, that'll do.

---------------
And so with these 3 pieces and using LoL-Logic I should be able to, in theory, craft Road Warrior Miss Fortune. Here we go.
 http://i.imgur.com/cgBrRdc.jpg

I hope this works.

http://i.imgur.com/WyLisxi.png

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
OH GOD WHAT HAVE I DONE!? This isn't Miss Fortune. This isn't Miss Fortune at all. 

Riot, please. Can you help me? It was never meant to be like this. It was meant to craft into Road Warrior {{champion:21}}.
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/e/ea/Miss_Fortune_RoadWarriorSkin.jpg

-----------------

tl;dr

Can Riot take my 3 legacy skin tokens and make them into Road Warrior MF for me? Please?

replies.body: Wait... How do you turn Orbs into Skins? Also, does anyone know what the Victory Emblem does? It's just sitting in my Loot.

The orbs have a chance at dropping legacy skins. I got these three in the 3 I opened.
As for the Emblem I'm not sure. Maybe if we win it turns into something?
I have 150 orbs, and don't have a legacy skin. How exactly do I open them?

Do you have 150 _orbs_ or _tokens_?

You can turn tokens into orbs by crafting 140 of them together.
Then open the orb the same way you would a chest, and it will give you a legacy skin shard, with a 50% chance of bonus loot.

The Victory emblem will be an icon that relates to either Riven or Yasuo depending on who wins the VS. event.
The icon will be available after the event is over.

Ohhhh... That explains a lot. Thanks :)

Is this also how you get Gemstones, or do you need to craft the Tokens into something else?

No worries ^^

Each orb has a 50% chance of dropping extra loot.
one of the 3 possible drops are a pair of gemstones.
It's worth noting it's also possible to just get one gemstone. That's what happened to me :P

Really? I didn't know that
Feelsbad :(
I didn't get any gems. 3 orbs 3 skins. Weird.
pfft yasuo obviously, look at the scale bar. Played more, riven winrate is massively higher, but he is played more.
Oh yea, we all knew Yas would win before the event even started.

Nicely done! haha

My friend has got 8 gemstones so far this event.
Last night he crafted Hextech Annie.

I am incredibly jealous, especially seeming I am the only one of our group who plays mid....
